DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether added food ingredient(s) affect glycaemic responses to a liquid meal tolerance test (LMTT).
DOC.brief_title: Glycaemic Response to a Liquid Meal Tolerance Test
DOC.criteria: 1. Male or female (not less than 40% Male) 2. Aged 18 55 years 3. Non Smokers 4. Have a body mass index between 18.5 to 29.99 kg/m2 5. Healthy, nondiabetic, no gastric bypass surgery 6. Not allergic to dairy, or soy 7. Have a fasting plasma glucose (fingerstick) <100 mg/dl (<5.5 mmol/L) 8. Willing and able to provide written informed consent
